title: A Running Example (2/4)

definitions.Automatic Curriculum: A system that adapts the learning path based on the learner's progress and performance.
definitions.Iterative Prompting Mechanism: A process that repeatedly asks for input or provides feedback to refine the output.
definitions.Skill Library: A collection of skills or tasks that can be performed or learned.

summary: The slide presents a running example of an AI system with an automatic curriculum that adapts based on the learner's progress. It includes an iterative prompting mechanism that refines tasks through a skill library. The example demonstrates how the system equips a bot with a sword to combat a zombie after mining wood and diamond.
